errors_with_submission: There were errors with your submission
payment_processed_successfully: Your payment has been processed successfully
transaction_completed_successfully: Your transaction has been completed successfully.
confirmation_email_sent: A confirmation email will be sent to your registered email address.
payment_could_not_processed: Your payment could not be processed
unable_process_payment: Unfortunately, we were unable to process your payment. Please try again or use a different payment method.
try_again_different_method: You can try again with the same or different payment method.
status_pending_message: Your payment is waiting to be processed. Please complete the payment to continue.
status_completed_message: Your payment has been completed successfully. Thank you for your purchase!
status_failed_message: Your payment could not be processed. Please try again or contact support.
status_cancelled_message: Your payment has been cancelled. You can restart the payment process if needed.
status_unknown_message: Payment status is unknown. Please contact support for assistance.
dummy_payment_description: This is a dummy payment gateway for testing purposes. Choose one of the options below to simulate different payment scenarios.
test_callback_functionality: Test the callback functionality manually by sending different status values.
pay_now_or_split_into_installments: Pay now or split into 4 interest-free installments
split_your_payment_into_4_interest_free_: Split your payment of :amount into 4 interest-free installments of :amount each
unable_to_load_payment_form: Unable to load payment form. Please try again.
payment_error_general: Sorry, an error occurred while initializing the payment system. Please try again or contact customer service.
payment_error_configuration: System configuration error. Please contact customer service.
payment_error_network: Connection issue. Please check your internet connection and try again.
payment_error_rejected: Request was rejected. Please check your data and try again.
payment_error_invalid_request: Invalid request. Please check your order details and try again.
payment_error_support_message: If the problem persists, please contact our technical support team.
pay_later_or_split_installments: Pay later or split into installments
split_payment_installments: Split your payment into easy installments
tamara_bnpl_description: Shop now and pay later with Tamara - No interest, no fees
alawneh_pay_payment_success_message: Your payment has been accepted and processed successfully via Alawneh Pay.
alawneh_pay_payment_processing_message: Your payment is being processed. Please wait for confirmation.
alawneh_pay_payment_failed_message: We were unable to process your payment through Alawneh Pay.
check_payment_details: Check your payment details and try again
contact_support_if_problem_persists: Contact support if the problem persists
hyperpay_payment_failed_message: We were unable to process your payment through HyperPay.

payment_cancelled_message: Your payment has been cancelled. No charges were made.
no_charges_made: No charges were made to your account. You can try again anytime.
